languages.text: "Проктор, отставить! Ваши отчеты были более чем исчерпывающие — данная картина событий составлена на их основе. Показания давать будете по запросу префекта. Вам все ясно?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Проктор, отставить! Ваши отчеты были более чем исчерпывающие — данная картина событий составлена на их основе. Показания давать будете по запросу префекта. Вам все ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

"Proctor, stand down! You will not intervene in the proceedings of this sacred court without permission. Your reports were quite comprehensive — our understanding of these events is founded on them. You will give your testimony when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"
"Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

languages.text: "Proktor, zurück! Das ist ein Befehl. Eure Befehle waren recht umfassend und bilden das Fundament dieses Falles. Ihr werdet Eure Aussage nur machen, wenn die Präfektin Euch dazu auffordert. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Proktor, zurück! Das ist ein Befehl. Eure Befehle waren recht umfassend und bilden das Fundament dieses Falles. Ihr werdet Eure Aussage nur machen, wenn die Präfektin Euch dazu auffordert. Ist das klar?"

"Proktor, zurück! Ihr werdet nicht ohne Erlaubnis in den Fortgang dieses heiligen Verfahrens eingreifen. Eure Berichte waren recht umfassend ... unser Wissen um diese Vorgänge basiert auf ihnen. Ihr werdet Eure Aussage machen, wenn die Präfektin Euch dazu auffordert. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: « Il suffit, proctor ! C'est un ordre. Vos rapports étaient très complets et ont servi à élaborer le dossier. Vous témoignerez quand la préfète l'exigera. C'est bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Il suffit, proctor ! C'est un ordre. Vos rapports étaient très complets et ont servi à élaborer le dossier. Vous témoignerez quand la préfète l'exigera. C'est bien clair ? »

« Il suffit, proctor ! Vous n'interviendrez plus dans les débats de cette cour sacrée sans y avoir été invité. Vos rapports sont des plus complets et c'est sur eux que repose notre compréhension de ces événements. Vous témoignerez quand la préfète l'exigera. C'est bien clair ? »

languages.text: “监察官，立刻退下！这是命令。你的报告写得很全面，这场审判完全基于报告内容的基础之上。只有行政官要求你作证时，你才可以作证，听明白了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “监察官，立刻退下！这是命令。你的报告写得很全面，这场审判完全基于报告内容的基础之上。只有行政官要求你作证时，你才可以作证，听明白了吗？”
“监察官，立刻退下！在未经允许的情况下，你无权干涉神圣法庭的秩序。你的报告非常全面，我们对上述情况的了解完全基于这份报告的内容。只有行政官要求你作证时，你才可以作证，听明白了吗？”

languages.text: «¡Procurador, vuelva a su asiento! Es una orden. Sus informes fueron muy detallados y constituyen la base de este proceso. Dará su testimonio cuando lo solicite la prefecta. ¿Está claro?».
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Procurador, vuelva a su asiento! Es una orden. Sus informes fueron muy detallados y constituyen la base de este proceso. Dará su testimonio cuando lo solicite la prefecta. ¿Está claro?».

«¡Procurador, vuelva a su asiento! No intervendrá en el proceso de este tribunal sagrado sin permiso. Sus informes fueron muy detallados; nuestra comprensión de estos eventos está basada en ellos. Dará su testimonio cuando lo solicite la prefecta. ¿Está claro?».

languages.text: 「代理人、下がれ！これは命令だ。君の報告は非常に詳細で、この裁判の土台となっている。総監が要請したときにだけ証言しろ。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「代理人、下がれ！これは命令だ。君の報告は非常に詳細で、この裁判の土台となっている。総監が要請したときにだけ証言しろ。わかったか？」

languages.text: "Otur yerine Üsteğmen! Bu bir emirdir. Raporların gayet detaylıydı, ayrıca bu davanın temelini hazırladı. Yalnızca prefet istediğinde konuşacaksın, anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor, stand down! That is an order. Your reports were quite comprehensive and are the foundation of this case. You will provide your testimony only when the prefect requests it. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Otur yerine Üsteğmen! Bu bir emirdir. Raporların gayet detaylıydı, ayrıca bu davanın temelini hazırladı. Yalnızca prefet istediğinde konuşacaksın, anlaşıldı mı?"

"Otur yerine Üsteğmen! Kutsal mahkemenin işleyişine söz almadan müdahale edilmeyecek. Sunmuş olduğun raporlar, ziyadesiyle kapsamlıydı. Yaşanan olayları da bu raporlardan hareketle yorumladık. Prefekt sana sorduğu zaman vereceksin ifadeni, anlaşıldı mı?"
